projects.name: Sikonde
projects.description: Sikonde is a web application designed for psychological consultation for the residents of Depok. It has been officially granted to the Depok Government and has obtained Intellectual Property Rights. The app is currently operational and actively used in collaboration with psychologists from PUSPAGA Depok. Key features include online consultation, a mood tracker, and a gratitude journal.

projects.name: CovIndex
projects.description: Covindex is a Covid-19 information search engine derived from journal paper datasets about Covid-19. Made with PyTerrier in Python. For demo and explanation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VNSSa64F6pI

projects.name: WMS
projects.description: WMS is a warehouse management information system for PT Krida Technologies. Developed in a team for softeng project at Fasilkom UI.

projects.name: Mikostop
projects.description: Mikostop is a website to help diagnose Aspergillosis infected disease. Developed in a team in collaboration with IPMC.

projects.name: Motive Academy
projects.description: Motive Academy is a learning course website for Muslim youth as one of the features of Motive startup.

projects.name: Parentie
projects.description: Parentie is a parenting support application to connect and aid inexperienced parents by providing the right needs. We provide personalized profiles and django websoket-powered chat feature to encourage parents to reach out, communicate, and form agreements to become milk mothers, ensuring that every baby gets the nourishment they need. Furthermore, Parentie includes a Forum feature to support both mothers and fathers. In the discussion section, parents can ask and answer questions, gaining insights from other parents, and share information around parenting related events.

projects.name: Ecotecture
projects.description: Ecotecture is a web application prototype for an eco friendly architecture service. Ecotecture provides a solar panel simulator and renewable energy recommendation based on area in Indonesia. This application offers help for people who are looking for green architect services in their area.

projects.name: UIVerse
projects.description: UIVerse is a social media website for University of Indonesia (UI) students to discuss about topics revolving around UI.

projects.name: Lakutenan
projects.description: Lakutenan is a web app to help connect SMEs and event organizers complete their needs and benefits.

projects.name: Budiman
projects.description: Budiman is a budget management web app where users can log expenses and income to be tracked and analysed effectively. Developed for advanced programming course at Fasilkom UI.

projects.name: Irama Kain
projects.description: Irama Kain is a web and mobile application for clothing donation. Users donate their unused clothes to be reworked in a gallery, then receive coins to be used for the reworked clothing market.
